entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 60%
